title: Swiss Re, Climeworks Strike 10-Year Carbon-Removal Deal
sub_head: Agreement comes as companies look for innovative ways to cut emissions
body:
Swiss Re AG has signed a 10-year, $10 million agreement with Swiss startup Climeworks AG to capture carbon dioxide and turn it into underground rock, a deal set to give the reinsurer early access to novel carbon-removal tools.
The deal will help Swiss Re with its goal of reaching net-zero emissions in its operations by 2030, the reinsurer said Wednesday.
Climeworks...
